camera_sample.name: Entrance Cam
camera_sample.short_description: Model: AI-Cam X512 | Resolution: 2560×1440 (2K Quad HD)
camera_sample.details_description:
Model: AI-Cam X512
Resolution: 2560 × 1440 (2K Quad HD)
Frame Rate: 30 FPS
Lens: 3.6mm Fixed Lens
Field of View: 110° (Horizontal)
Night Vision: IR-Cut Filter, 30m (98ft) Range
AI Features:
  - Person Detection
  - Vehicle Detection
  - Face Recognition
  - Intrusion Zone Detection
  - License Plate Recognition (LPR)
Video Compression: H.265 / H.264 / MJPEG
Audio: Built-in Mic & Speaker (Two-way audio)
Storage:
  - microSD Card up to 256GB
  - Cloud (optional)
  - RTSP/NVR supported
Connectivity:
  - Ethernet (RJ45, PoE)
  - Wi-Fi 2.4GHz (optional model)
Power: PoE (802.3af) or 12V DC
Operating Temperature: -20°C to 60°C
Waterproof Rating: IP67
Smart Alerts: Real-time push notification with snapshot
Dimensions: 145mm × 70mm × 70mm
Weight: 350g
